TITLE GOES HERE: The following code chunk throws an error. 

```{r error=TRUE, message=FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
mtcars %>%
  filter(cyl = 4)
```

The error suggests that you need to use `==` inside of `filter()`. Why? 

<!--answer-start-->
Because you are testing for equality, not asserting it.
<!--answer-end-->
